<rules> <rule> <conditions> <condition test="Equals"> <source>Current Value</source> <value id="1">N/A</value> </condition> </conditions> <actions> <action type="property"> <target>Visibility</target> <value>false</value> </action> </actions> </rule> <rule> <conditions> <condition test="Does not equal"> <source>Current Value</source> <value id="1">N/A</value> </condition> </conditions> <actions> <action type="property"> <target>Visibility</target> <value>true</value> </action> </actions> </rule> <rule> <conditions> <condition test="Equals"> <source>Current Value</source> <value id="1">High</value> </condition> </conditions> <actions> <action type="property"> <target>Image</target> <value>Battery/battery_green.png</value> </action> </actions> </rule> <rule> <conditions> <condition test="Equals"> <source>Current Value</source> <value id="1">Medium-High</value> </condition> </conditions> <actions> <action type="property"> <target>Image</target> <value>Battery/battery_yellow.png</value> </action> </actions> </rule> <rule> <conditions> <condition test="Equals"> <source>Current Value</source> <value id="1">Medium-Low</value> </condition> </conditions> <actions> <action type="property"> <target>Image</target> <value>Battery/battery_orange.png</value> </action> </actions> </rule> <rule> <conditions> <condition test="Equals"> <source>Current Value</source> <value id="1">Low</value> </condition> </conditions> <actions> <action type="property"> <target>Image</target> <value>Battery/battery_red.png</value> </action> </actions> </rule> <rule> <conditions> <condition test="Equals"> <source>Current Value</source> <value id="1">Unknown</value> </condition> </conditions> <actions> <action type="property"> <target>Image</target> <value>Battery/battery_purple.png</value> </action> </actions> </rule> <rule> <conditions> <condition test="Equals"> <source>Current Value</source> <value id="1">N/A</value> </condition> </conditions> <actions> <action type="property"> <target>Image</target> <value>Battery/battery_gray.png</value> </action> </actions> </rule> </rules>

The theme is designed around having a quad core PC with 2 graphics cards but is easily customizable.
If you want to use different monitoring applications (e.g. CoreTemp instead of SpeedFan) select each of the text and status image items under the "Cores" and "Fan" sections and change the "Application" field for each accordingly. You may also need to tweak the value type/group/item fields as appropriate.

Similarly, to convert this theme from using MSI Afterburner to another graphics card monitoring tool, select the items under the "GPUs" heading and change them as required.

[Eos Layout]
This layout is by Triscopic, but uses the following resources:
  • "Eos" background by elusive @ DeviantArt.
  • "Silk" icons by famfamfam.com.
  • Weather Images by Yahoo!
Don't forget to set your location on the Plugins tab - select the Weather Plugin and enter your location and unit choices there.

You may also want to change the warning levels on the temperatures & fan status icons (the values set here work for me, but I don't guarantee them for anyone else - check your hardware's recommended values!)

<rules> <rule> <conditions> <condition test="Equals"> <source>Input 1</source> <value id="1">0</value> </condition> </conditions> <actions> <action type="property"> <target>State</target> <value>N/A</value> </action> </actions> </rule> <rule> <conditions> <condition test="Does not equal"> <source>Input 2</source> <value id="1"/> </condition> </conditions> <actions> <action type="property"> <target>State</target> <value>MUSIC</value> </action> </actions> </rule> <rule> <conditions> <condition test="Does not equal"> <source>Input 1</source> <value id="1">0</value> </condition> </conditions> <actions> <action type="property"> <target>State</target> <value>TS3</value> </action> </actions> </rule> <rule> <conditions> <condition test="Equals"> <source>State</source> <value id="1">N/A</value> </condition> </conditions> <actions> <action type="property"> <target>Output</target> <value>OFF</value> </action> </actions> </rule> <rule> <conditions> <condition test="Equals"> <source>State</source> <value id="1">MUSIC</value> </condition> </conditions> <actions> <action type="property"> <target>Output</target> <value>MUSIC</value> </action> </actions> </rule> <rule> <conditions> <condition test="Equals"> <source>State</source> <value id="1">TS3</value> </condition> </conditions> <actions> <action type="property"> <target>Output</target> <value>TS3</value> </action> </actions> </rule> <rule> <conditions> <condition test="Equals"> <source>State</source> <value id="1">N/A</value> </condition> </conditions> <actions> <action type="property"> <target>Visibility</target> <value>false</value> </action> </actions> </rule> <rule> <conditions> <condition test="Does not equal"> <source>State</source> <value id="1">N/A</value> </condition> </conditions> <actions> <action type="property"> <target>Visibility</target> <value>true</value> </action> </actions> </rule> </rules>
